name: MkDocs Publisher
description: A simple action to build an MkDocs site and push it to the gh-pages branch. Should be easy to use.
author: DevRel Team

python-version.description: The version of Python to set up for building.

requirements-file.description: Path to the Python requirements file

gh-token.description: GitHub token for deployment. This is usually ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}.
gh-token.deprecationMessage: Prefer using GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable directly if permissions allow.

page-url.description: The URL of the deployed GitHub Pages site.
